title: How to Cook Razor Clams

steps.headline: Put the clams into the colander and rinse with cold water to remove obvious foreign objects.
Put the colander of calms unto a sink and get boiling water ready.
Pour boiling water over the clams until they pop open.
steps.description: Don't let them soak in the water.

steps.headline: Cut off the tough part of the neck.
Cut along the zipper to open the body.
Remove the diggers, stomach and gills.
Rinse the clams under cold water.
Pour a layer of oil into the frying pan.
Put the frying pan over hot heat.
Place the clams into the frying pan.
Cook them for 1 minute or until golden brown.
Serve the clams on a paper towel so the oil can be absorbed.
